result.execSummary:
Jovon Jontrell Malone was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jovon Jontrell Malone was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jovon Jontrell Malone

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jovon Jontrell Malone not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant has been turned over to the State of Illinois.  On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Jovon Jontrell Malone in court with attorney Louis Edward Epps.  Defendant Jovon Jontrell Malone in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant serving a sentence until 02/23/2015.  Status conference as to defendant's extradition has been set.  Status conference scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jovon Jontrell Malone in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent. 
Defendant Jovon Jontrell Malone in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  

Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  
Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of ILLINOIS.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  
Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  
Status conference scheduled for February 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jovon Jontrell Malone
Current: 3341 N 48th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 01-21-2015)
Prior: 1438 North 89th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53226
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
